name: Space-Slime Continuum
description:
Space-Slime Continuum

Made by: Alex Estell and Brad Hollander

In this platformer you don't control which level you're playing, or when you swap between the levels.

Momentum is retained for each level individually. If you're having trouble, make sure you are holding the same jump/movement buttons you were pressing for that level when you return.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control

--------------------------------------------------

Enter to Start

F for Fullscreen

Left/Right or A/D to Move

Space or W to jump

C for Credits

Esc to Quit

Your portal machine seems to be malfunctioning.
We're working on it.
Just try to get back to the teleporter.
